name: fortinet-fortimanager-json-rpc
label: Fortinet FortiManager JSON RPC
description: The Fortinet FortiManager JSON RPC Connector is an advanced connector with freeform actions to use the JSON-RPC API directly. This connector puts the onus on the user to understand the FortiManager API. To use the connector that simplify actions please see the original Fortinet FortiManager Connector

fields.name: address
fields.title: Hostname
fields.tooltip: Provide the IP address or Hostname of the FortiManager endpoint server to which you will connect
fields.description: IP address or Hostname of the Fortinet FortiManager endpoint server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: username
fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username with JSON-RPC enabled to access the Fortinet FortiManager server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: password
fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Fortinet FortiManager server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: port
fields.title: Port
fields.description: Port number used to access the Fortinet FortiManager server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations. By default, this is set to 443.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

fields.name: debug_connection
fields.title: Debug Connection
fields.description: Only used with the json_rpc connections, and enables the debug. This can sometimes cause an I/O operation error since debugging involves printing responses, which writes to the integration.log file.

fields.name: verbose_json
fields.title: Verbose JSON
fields.description: Setting this to true adds a verbose flag to the request, so that the integers are translated to the string representation by FortiManager.

operations.title: JSON RPC Add
operations.description: A Generic FMG Add action that lets you specify any valid URL and data object

parameters.name: url
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: The url you wish to hit

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.

operations.title: JSON RPC Set
operations.description: A Generic FMG Set action that lets you specify any valid URL and data object

parameters.name: url
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: The url you wish to hit

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.

operations.title: JSON RPC Get
operations.description: A Generic FMG Get action that lets you specify any valid URL and data object

parameters.name: url
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: The url you wish to hit

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.

operations.title: JSON RPC Exec
operations.description: A Generic FMG Execute action that lets you specify any valid URL and data object

parameters.name: url
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: The url you wish to hit

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.

parameters.name: track_task
parameters.title: Track Task
parameters.description: Checking this box will attempt to track a task if found, and wait to return the output until that task is complete

true.title: Task Timeout
true.name: task_timeout
true.description: The time in seconds to wait for the task to complete before returning an error

operations.title: JSON RPC Delete
operations.description: A Generic FMG Delete action that lets you specify any valid URL and data object

parameters.name: url
parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: The url you wish to hit

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.

operations.title: JSON RPC Freeform
operations.description: A Generic FMG freeform action that lets you specify a list of dictionaries of URLs and data objects

parameters.name: method
parameters.title: Method
parameters.description: The method you want to send with the json rpc request

parameters.name: data
parameters.title: Data
parameters.description: Pass a json object for the data you want to send.
